name: Frog Test v0.3 Metroidvania Jam
description:
Moving= W,A,S,D or the Arrows keys, on the keyboard, space to jump.

To aim the direction of shooting is mouse direction.

To shoot, is left click on mouse.

To use sword is right mouse click.

Well help if you add some comments. Thanks.

Frog test v0.3 Metroidvania Jam. We now have a small tutorial, we have some improvements in animation, adapted the colliders to the animation, we have a new move "Dashing" witch is activated by pressing LeftShift key.

Frog Test v0.2 Metroidvania Jam, some more work on parallax this time.
